maintext: Barrie OPP arrested a 55 year old man on Sunday after he was allegedly caught driving drunk, with 1 rifle, 4 handguns and a crossbow in his car. Four of those guns were not properly secured. Officers also found illegal tobacco in the vehicle as well. Officers seized all the suspects weapons and his license has been suspended for 90 days.
title: Man Arrested After Allegedly Driving Drunk With Guns In The Car
